sn1.13:1.2: Standing to one side, that deity recited this verse in the Buddha’s presence:
sn1.13:2.1: “There’s no love like that for a child,
sn1.13:2.3: no light like that of the sun,
sn1.13:2.4: and of waters the ocean is paramount.”
sn1.13:3.1: “There’s no love like that for oneself,
sn1.13:3.3: no light like that of wisdom,
sn1.13:3.4: and of waters the rain is paramount.”
